result.name: Sustainable Small Ruminant Production through Selection for Resistance to Internal Parasites (sheep)
result.description: Animals used in the study belong to from four commercial farms and Langston University, born between 2013 and 2015. A total number of one hundred and forty four sheep were genotyped with Capture Sequencing (Rapid Genomics, Gainesville, FL). The first 47 samples correspond to Dorper sheep. Then the next 57 samples correspond to Katahdin sheep. Finally, the last 40 samples correspond to St. Croix sheep.
result.center: University of Florida, Department of Animal Sciences
